a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Consumption-based vs. production-based COâ‚‚ emissions per capita, 2020
Consumption-based emissions are national emissions that have been adjusted for trade. This measures fossil fuel
and industry emissions. Land use change is not included.
Data source: Global Carbon Budget (2022); Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
